radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse cerebral and cerebellar atrophy; poorly defined band of increased signal intensity in the periventricular white matter on T1-weighted images; slight enlargement of lateral ventricle and cisterna magna; cerebellum appeared intact.

Poorly demarcated, periventricular, band-like signal present bilaterally that was isointense in relation to cortical gray matter on all imaging sequences; slight prominence of the ventricles, cisterns, and sulci.
